    void
    moveProf()
    Assign the Professor to the correct index of player by comparing in the dining room of the players the number of pawns, with the same color of the prof, The player who have the bigger number of pawns of that color wins the prof

    • createArrayPawn

      static ArrayList<ColorPawn> createArrayPawn(StudentBag studentBag)
      This function is useful to create fast an array of the color that are in the StudentBag (if a color misses it doesn't get added to the array)
      Returns:
      ArrayPawn with the color

    • checkIsland

      public static boolean checkIsland(int i, int j, Game game)
      Check if the 2 islands can be unified or not and if the 2 islands can be unified sum pawns to island 1
      Parameters:
      i - (island 1)
      j - (island 2)
      Returns:
      boolean: if is "true" the islands have been merged

    • topInfluence

      public void topInfluence(Island island, Game game)
      Calculates the influence of the island and eventually calls the function UnifyIsland

    • setCharacterCards

      public void setCharacterCards(Game game)
      Randomizer the 3 CharacterCards of that Game and puts these in the characterCards array

    • moveProf

      public void moveProf()
      Assign the Professor to the correct index of player by comparing in the dining room of the players the number of pawns, with the same color of the prof, The player who have the bigger number of pawns of that color wins the prof
      See Also:
      • ProfTable

    • finish

      public Player finish(Boolean lastTurn)
      Check if the game is finished after every turn or after the MoveMotherNature
      Returns:
      the winner Player or "null"
